name: code-runway
title: Code Runway
description: A project launcher for developers. Quickly search projects and launch them with Warp configurations.
author: gongchr

commands.name: directory-settings
commands.title: Directory Settings
commands.description: Manage project directories, including adding, removing, and enabling/disabling them

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
